document_data.name: Kalman Leiyraghon
document_data.mainbody: '''Kalman Leiyraghon''' was a scion of [[Leiyraghon House]] in [[Melvaunt]] in [[1374 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Kalman wandered through all the taverns in Melvaunt.
document_data.History:
In 1374 DR, he met the [[dwarf]] mercenary [[Dorn Crownshield]] at [[The Rusty Bucket]] tavern. However, secretly, he met with his friends [[Argens Bruil]], [[Elaint Marsk]], [[Kara Calaudra]], and [[Oreal Nanther]] planning to go on an adventure, with the support of Dorn.

They found a "treasure map" (in truth, a trap devised by [[Bremen Leiyraghon]]) and went on adventure in [[Thar]], only to be captured by the [[orog]] [[Daazlag]] and his [[orc]] minions.

Kalman was imprisoned in a cave in [[XÃ»l-Jarak]] with all his friends. Kalman was waiting for the right time to escape using all his ready [[spell]]s but cared more for himself than for his friends.
